Are you a frontend ninja?

Frontend ninjas are superheros who bring life into designs.
We are looking for frontend ninjas with knack of amazing attention to detail.
Are you one?

What should you have

Attention to detail

We look for attention to detail in our candidates.As a frontend intern, you should have a superpowers of looking into details of a deign.

Frontend tech knowledge

You must be equipped to learn and explore new technologies. You are not afraid to implement a new framework or language.

Love for technology

We eat, sleep and breathe technology. You should have love for technology.
